title: Treaty banning the production of fissile material for nuclear weapons or other nuclear explosive devices
text:
United Nations 
A/C.1/80/L.39
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
14 October 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-16638 (E)    171025 
*2516638* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
First Committee 
Agenda item 99 (a) 
General and complete disarmament: treaty banning the 
production of fissile material for nuclear weapons or other 
nuclear explosive devices 
 
 
 
 
 
Canada, Germany and Netherlands (Kingdom of the): draft decision 
 
 
 
 Treaty banning the production of fissile material for nuclear 
weapons or other nuclear explosive devices 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, recalling its resolution 78/28 of 4 December 2023 and 
its decision 79/513 of 2 December 2024, decides to include in the provisional agenda 
of its eighty-first session, under the item entitled “General and complete 
disarmament”, the sub-item entitled “Treaty banning the production of fissile material 
for nuclear weapons or other nuclear explosive devices”.
